title.rendered: 2021 G2 reports are published – Hivency named as leader.

content.rendered:
Every year, G2 helps many companies make purchasing decisions for their software. In addition to offering more than 1.2 million evaluations, G2 publishes annual reports that give the reader a clear picture of the best technology solutions on the market. In the latest report published in July 2021, Hivency received six new awards.

These awards are in addition to the six others received in the Winter 2021 and April 2021 reports. G2 first named the Hivency influence platform as :

  • “Leader“: This category means that the product is “Leader” of the winter 2021 report and has been highly ranked by G2 Crowd users and received very good satisfaction and market presence scores.
  • “High performer“: Products in the “High performer” category have high customer satisfaction scores.
  • “User love us“: This badge is obtained after collecting 20 reviews with an average rating of 4.0 stars.

Then last April, G2 appointed Hivency as Leader in Europe, High Performer, Users Love US. Hivency also ranks first in the G2 ranking of Europe’s top 11 influence marketing platforms.

We are very proud of these awards and recognition and thank our customers for trusting us.

 

 

 

Hivency wins six new awards in july 2021

Three new awards have been added to the previous ones obtained at the end of 2020 and april 2021. Indeed, the G2 platform has named the 360 Hivency solution:

  • Leader Europe Summer 2021
  • Leader Enterprise Summer 2021
  • Leader Summer 2021
  • Highest User Adoption Small-Business Summer 2021
  • High Performer Mid Market Summer 2021
  • Leader Small Business Summer 2021

Our customers’ opinions

Since the creation of our influencer platform, our priority has been customer satisfaction. Happy client, Happy Hivency is one of our founding values and all of our employees that support brands on a daily basis in optimising their influencer marketing strategy have it present in their activities. In addition to having all of our tools on a single platform, we offer them personalised support. Here are some of the opinions written by our clients:

  • “Smooth, easy and efficient experience”
  • “Hivency leverages our business to top tier at external communication and influence marketing”
  • “Best platform so far to connect with influencers”
  • “Great platform with an experienced team!”

Discover all of our clients’ reviews on G2.

What is G2?

G2 (previously G2 Crowd) is an evaluation platform that offers product users the opportunity to leave written opinions on a company’s profile. It is the world’s leading evaluation platform for B2B software and services.
